layout.name: Desk
layout.position: Against the wall opposite the window
layout.orientation: Facing the window for natural light

layout.name: Shelving
layout.position: Along the wall adjacent to the desk

rationales: The minimalist style keeps the space uncluttered, ideal for a small office.
White and light gray walls maximize natural light from the East‑South window.
Laminate flooring is cost‑effective and easy to maintain.
Glass desk surface gives a sense of openness without breaking the budget.
Steel frame chair provides ergonomic support while staying within price limits.
PVC blinds allow light control and are inexpensive.
Recycled wood shelving adds texture and sustainability.
LED strip lighting reduces eye strain and enhances the modern look.
A single plant improves air quality and adds a subtle natural element.
Abstract wall art offers visual interest without clutter.
